rows.label: qst201904_msg0001
rows.name:
So much money?! Are you
really sure about this?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0002
rows.name: Do not worry about it.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0003
rows.name:
It is against our policy to
ignore a woman in distress.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm the one who gave
the money, though...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0005
rows.name:
If you're a man, don't complain!
Nitpicky men are not popular, Rex.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0006
rows.name:
With that money, you should
be able to live for a while.
Use it to get by for now.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0007
rows.name: Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0008
rows.name: Yes, we have decided!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0009
rows.name: ...Decided what?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0010
rows.name:
That girl will grow up
to be quite a beauty.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0011
rows.name: We shall invite her to our harem!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0012
rows.name:
If that's decided, then we
must follow her at once-

rows.label: qst201904_msg0013
rows.name: Please wait, mo.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0014
rows.name:
Shouldn't we prioritize finding
the Nopon who scammed Rinne, mo?

rows.label: qst201904_msg0015
rows.name: Ah, yes, that is right!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0016
rows.name: As expected of Hana! A sound judgment!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0017
rows.name:
However, moving blindly
will get us nowhere...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0018
rows.name:
Perhaps we should go where
many Nopon gather and
collect information...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0019
rows.name:
Alright, let us go to
the Avaritia Guild!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0020
rows.name:
There are many Nopon merchants
there, so we might be able
to get some information.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0021
rows.name:
And if we're lucky, we might even
run into the black-feathered fool.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0022
rows.name:
If that's decided, then
we must depart at once!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0023
rows.name:
I wonder if we'll find him that
easily... Goldmund is quite large.

rows.label: qst201904_msg0024
rows.name: Have no fear. Knowing those fools...

rows.label: qst201904_msg0025
rows.name:
They must have disembarked and
are probably loitering around
the Goldmund Return Port!

rows.label: qst201904_msg0026
rows.name: Now, let's go! Follow us!
